mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `basic_user_info` (subscribe, openid, language, subscribe_time, unionid, remark, groupid, tagid_list, subscribe_scene, qr_scene, qr_scene_str) VALUES (#{subscribe}, #{openid}, #{language}, FROM_UNIXTIME(#{subscribe_time}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s'), #{unionid}, #{remark}, #{groupid}, #{tagid_list}, #{subscribe_scene}, #{qr_scene}, #{qr_scene_str})
